detectors.description:
GXCRelay.deliverETH(address,uint256,string,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#935-940) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- to.transfer(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#938)
detectors.markdown:
[GXCRelay.deliverETH(address,uint256,string,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#L935-L940) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [to.transfer(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#L938)

detectors.description: GXCRelay.deposit(address,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#917-922) ignores return value by IERC20(token).transferFrom(_msgSender(),address(this),amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#920)

GXCRelay.deliver(address,address,uint256,string,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#929-934) ignores return value by IERC20(token).transfer(to,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#932)

Reentrancy in GXCRelay.deliver(address,address,uint256,string,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#929-934):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(token).transfer(to,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#932)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Deliver(token,to,amount,from,txid) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#933)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [GXCRelay.deliver(address,address,uint256,string,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#L929-L934):

detectors.description:

	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#305)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#367-388):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#371)
Variable GXCRelay.ETHSettings (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GXCRelay.sol#893) is not in mixedCase
